mapper.update: update website_productbuyinfo set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imgpath = #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `parameter` = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, details = #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `createuser` = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, title, content, `order`, imgpath, `parameter`, price, details, notice, createtime, `createuser` from website_productbuyinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
